title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Hiroshima Intl Airport - version 1 0
description:
In this addon spotlight we will look at Hiroshima Intl Airport which has been released a few days ago. The airport is located on a mountain which really results in great surroundings and a really cool approach.

This addon can be downloaded from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/20679/rjoa-hiroshima-intl-airport
